Interview with Jason Cranford Teague at WebVisions 2013

Interviewee: Jason Cranford Teague
Topic: developer community and conference conversations
Conference: WebVisions 2013 · Community: General
Description: Prolific tech author and speaker, Jason Cranford Teague sat down for a bit at WebVisions 2013 in Chicago to discuss authoring and the evolution of print and digital technical publishing.
